thread.title: Carl Smith
thread.title_full: Optical Express | Laser Eye Surgery reviewed by Carl Smith

author: Carl Smith
title: Carl Smith
text: What started out as a passing thought over Christmas turned into reality recently. Popped into the Nottingham branch and from then realised 'yes' the surgery was for me. The whole process was explained to me and within one month I can see the world now in HD. A pain free and relatively short procedure. Many thanks to all.
